long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RealVPN: The Ultimate VPN Proxy Extension for Chrome

Experience true online freedom and security with RealVPN. Protect your privacy, secure your data, and browse the web anonymously with our reliable and ultra-fast VPN proxy extension for Chrome.

Features:

✔ Easy to Use: Activate protection with just one click.

✔ Global Servers: Access multiple VPN servers worldwide for optimal connection speeds.

✔ Unrestricted Access: Bypass geo-restrictions to enjoy your favorite websites and social media platforms anywhere.

✔ Secure Browsing: Safely conduct online shopping and banking with encrypted connections.

✔ Advanced Encryption: Military-grade AES-256 encryption safeguards your sensitive data like credit cards and passwords.

✔ Complete Anonymity: Hide your IP address and location from trackers, advertisers, and hackers.

✔ Affordable Plans: Get the best value with our pricing options, including lifetime plans—pay once and use forever.

✔ Multi-Device Support: Protect up to 5 devices simultaneously with a single account.

✔ 24/7 Customer Support: Our dedicated support team is always available to assist you.

How RealVPN Works:

RealVPN encrypts your internet connection, securing all data transmitted from your device. This means your personal information is protected from identity thieves and hackers, especially when using public Wi-Fi networks in places like airports, hotels, and cafes. With RealVPN, your online activities remain private, and your physical location is hidden from websites and advertisers.

Privacy Policy:

We respect your privacy. RealVPN does not monitor your activities or store any logs. Our service is fully GDPR-compliant. Read our full Privacy Policy at https://www.realvpn.io/privacy-policy.

Upgrade Your Plan:

Unlock unlimited access to all RealVPN servers worldwide without any traffic or speed limitations. Enjoy secure and fast browsing on up to 5 devices at the same time.

Support:

Need assistance? Contact our support team at support@realvpn.io.

Download RealVPN now and enjoy a secure, fast, and unrestricted internet experience!

Protect your privacy and access the internet without limits—add RealVPN to Chrome today!
